item.title: 印度最大资产管理公司据悉将于三月提交15亿美元IPO申请
item.description: 知情人士透露，SBI基金管理有限公司可能于下月提交首次公开募股的草案文件，这可能是印度资产管理公司规模最大的上市交易。【原文：SBI Funds Management Ltd. may file draft papers for an initial public offering next month, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the biggest listing by an asset management company in India.】

item.title: 隆巴德·奥迪尔基金经理指控公司蓄意破坏基金运作
item.description: 纽约两名隆巴德·奥迪尔集团的投资组合经理正起诉这家瑞士公司及其高层管理人员，指控其将旗下ESG私募信贷基金孤立，导致该基金投资渠道受阻。【原文：A pair of Lombard Odier Group portfolio managers in New York are suing the Swiss firm and its top leaders for allegedly isolating their ESG private credit fund and starving it of investment.】

item.title: 加蓬因生活成本抗议蔓延暂停社交媒体服务
item.description: 加蓬媒体监管机构已暂停所有社交媒体平台运营，直至另行通知。此前该国政府因高昂的生活成本面临日益激烈的抗议活动。【原文：Gabon’s media regulator suspended all social media platforms until further notice, as the government faces growing protests over the high cost of living.】

item.title: CVC聘请金融界资深人士纳亚尔拓展印度业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在阿姆斯特丹上市的私募股权公司凯鹏华盈（CVC Capital Partners Plc）已任命前KKR印度公司首席执行官桑杰·纳亚尔（Sanjay Nayar）担任其在南亚国家的顾问委员会主席。此举旨在深化该公司在亚洲增长最快的私募股权市场之一的业务布局。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc, the Amsterdam-listed private equity firm, has named former KKR & Co. India chief Sanjay Nayar as chairman of its advisory board in the South Asian nation, in a move aimed at deepening its presence in one of Asia’s fastest-growing private equity markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其俱乐部加拉塔萨雷战胜尤文图斯后股价飙升
item.description: 土耳其足球豪门加拉塔萨雷的股价周三早盘一度上涨4.8%，此前该俱乐部在欧洲冠军联赛中战胜了意大利劲旅尤文图斯。【原文：Turkish football giant Galatasaray’s shares rose as much as 4.8% on Wednesday morning after the club’s victory over Italian heavyweight Juventus in the UEFA Champions League.】

item.title: 嘉能可刚果铜矿达成土地协议以提升产量
item.description: 嘉能可公司已与刚果民主共和国国有矿业公司就一处土地组合达成协议，这家大宗商品巨头表示，该协议将提升其卡莫托铜业公司的产量。【原文：Glencore Plc reached an agreement with the Democratic Republic of Congo’s state mining company over a land package that the commodity giant said will increase production at its Kamoto Copper Co.】

item.title: 南非通胀放缓，为降息创造条件
item.description: 南非1月份通胀率有所回落，更接近央行设定的3%目标，这为政策制定者下月会议时降息提供了依据。【原文：South African inflation eased in January, edging closer to the central bank’s 3% target, bolstering the case for an interest-rate cut when policymakers meet next month.】

item.title: LEO制药公司筹备今年IPO，正与投资者举行会谈
item.description: LEO制药公司首席执行官克里斯托夫·布尔东表示，该公司管理层近几个月来正积极接触潜在投资者，为今年可能进行的股票上市做准备。【原文：LEO Pharma A/S’s leadership has been engaging prospective investors in recent months as it advances preparations for a potential stock market listing this year, Chief Executive Officer Christophe Bourdon said.】

item.title: 英国建筑商亨利·布特裁员，因房地产市场低迷冲击业务
item.description: 英国领先开发商亨利·布特公司（Henry Boot Plc）因房地产行业低迷而受挫，在出售建筑业务导致员工规模缩减约21%仅数周后，该公司正着手裁员。【原文：Henry Boot Plc, one of the UK’s leading developers hit by a property sector slump, is cutting jobs just weeks after the sale of its construction business saw its workforce shrink by about 21%.】

item.title: BAE系统公司创纪录业绩后，收益与销售额保持稳定增长
item.description: 英国宇航系统公司预测，继创纪录的2025年之后，本年度销售额和利润将保持强劲增长态势，这表明全球国防预算的快速扩张势头暂无减弱迹象。【原文：BAE Systems Plc predicted continued solid sales and earnings growth for the year after a record 2025, signaling the rapid expansion of defense budgets around the world shows little sign of abating.】

item.title: 迪拜股市创2014年以来最大涨幅，交易员目光超越石油与人工智能
item.description: 迪拜股市迎来12年来最强劲开局，投资者押注该酋长国经济韧性，目光超越波动的油价和人工智能交易。【原文：Dubai stocks are off to their strongest start in 12 years as investors bet on the emirate’s resilient economy and look beyond volatile oil and artificial-intelligence trades.】

item.title: 嘉能可利润下滑，铜价上涨被煤炭价格暴跌所抵消
item.description: 嘉能可公司全年利润下滑，创纪录的铜价未能抵消其庞大煤炭业务的收益下降。【原文：Glencore Plc posted a drop in full-year profit as record copper prices failed to offset declining earnings from its sprawling coal operations.】

item.title: 英国通胀率降至10个月低点，英格兰银行考虑3月降息
item.description: 英国通胀率降至2025年3月以来的最低水平，这为英国央行下月会议降息提供了有力依据。【原文：UK inflation dropped to its lowest level since March 2025, bolstering the case for an interest rate cut when the Bank of England meets next month.】

item.title: 科技投资机构Battery Ventures为新基金筹集32.5亿美元
item.description: 全球投资公司Battery Ventures已筹集32.5亿美元资金用于支持新技术交易，包括对软件公司的投资——此举押注该领域不会因人工智能引发的颠覆性变革而被取代。【原文：Global investment firm Battery Ventures has raised $3.25 billion to fund new tech deals, including investments in software companies — a bet that the sector won’t be toppled by artificial intelligence-led disruption.】

item.title: 初创公司Sarvam推出专为印度市场定制的人工智能模型
item.description: 一家名为Sarvam AI的印度初创公司正全力打造面向国内市场的有力竞争者，其推出的AI模型宣称比ChatGPT和Claude等产品更契合全球最大市场的语言与文化特性。【原文：An Indian startup called Sarvam AI is making a push to create a viable competitor for the domestic market, unveiling an artificial-intelligence model that it says is more tailored to the languages and cultures of the world’s biggest market than the likes of ChatGPT and Claude.】

item.title: 英伟达加速印度人工智能建设，E2E和Yotta公司获先进GPU支持
item.description: 英伟达公司正通过一系列本地合作与基础设施承诺深化其在印度的布局，助力这个南亚国家加速构建人工智能能力。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is deepening its India push with a series of local partnerships and infrastructure commitments, helping the South Asian country accelerate its efforts to build artificial intelligence capacity.】

item.title: 英国1月通胀率降至3%
分析师称印度央行将收紧离岸交易监管
item.description: 印度央行要求银行报告离岸卢比交易的提案将进一步加强该机构对外汇市场的管控力度，分析师表示。【原文：Indian central bank’s proposal requiring banks to report their offshore rupee transactions would further tighten the authority’s grip on the currency market, analysts said.】

item.title: 高市早苗正式当选首相，将加速推进预算审议
item.description: 高市早苗于周三在选举中取得压倒性胜利后，正式连任日本首相。这一程序性安排使她能够将注意力转向加快预算审议进程，并落实与美国总统特朗普达成的贸易协议。【原文：Sanae Takaichi was formally reelected as Japan’s Prime Minister on Wednesday following her resounding electoral win, a formality that allows her to turn her attention to expediting budget deliberations and implementing a trade deal agreed with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 拉加德据称考虑提前离任
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德预计将在其八年任期于2027年10月结束前卸任。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde is expected to step down from her role before her eight-year term ends in October 2027, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 阿尔法世代助力中国陷入困境的商场重振旗鼓
item.description:
面对电商冲击的购物中心正日益将目光投向儿童群体，希望吸引家长们一同前来消费。

【原文：

Shopping centers grappling with the shift to e-commerce increasingly focus on kids, hoping their parents will tag along.

】

item.title: 百达翡丽顶级表款引领二手市场升值浪潮
item.description: 由贵金属打造的百达翡丽顶级腕表正推动二手腕表市场持续复苏。【原文：Ultra-high-end Patek Philippe timepieces made from precious metals are driving a sustained recovery in the used watch market.】

item.title: 诺沃控股与ACS联合支持2.2亿欧元量化投资基金
item.description: 量子投资公司Quantonation Ventures为其第二支专注于物理基础技术的基金筹集了2.2亿欧元（约合2.6亿美元），该基金获得数据中心建设商ACS SA、诺和诺德控股股东等机构的支持。【原文：Quantum investment firm Quantonation Ventures has raised €220 million ($260 million) for its second fund devoted to physics-based technologies, backed by data center builder ACS SA and Novo Nordisk A/S’s controlling shareholder, among others.】

item.title: 黑人高收入者在南非最高收入阶层中所占比例扩大
item.description: 一项新研究发现，在南非民主统治的三十年间，黑人南非人的收入水平不断提高，这极大地改变了该国中高收入群体的种族构成。【原文：Rising remuneration among Black South Africans has dramatically changed the racial makeup of the country’s band of middle- and top-income earners over the course of three decades of democratic rule, a new study has found.】

item.title: 新西兰将货币政策会议次数增至每年八次
item.description: 新西兰央行将从2027年起将货币政策会议次数增至每年八次，此举旨在提高透明度和问责制。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank will increase the number of monetary policy meetings it holds to eight a year from 2027, in a move aimed at improving transparency and accountability.】

item.title: 改变心意，推动轮换
item.description:
多数资金管理人如今担忧企业正在过度投资。

【原文：

Most money managers are now worried that companies are overinvesting.

】

item.title: 德克萨斯首席执行官淡化人工智能担忧，公司股价因回购计划大涨
item.description: 德克思集团首席执行官罗斯·杜维内特驳斥了人工智能技术将损害房地产需求的担忧，称高端写字楼市场依然强劲。【原文：Dexus Chief Executive Officer Ross Du Vernet doused concerns that artificial technology will hurt real estate demand, saying the market for premium office space remains strong.】

item.title: 贝恩资本与瑞银集团向澳大利亚Quadrant旗下Aidacare公司提供3.82亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本信贷有限合伙公司与瑞银集团正向澳大利亚医疗设备制造商艾达凯有限公司提供总额达5.4亿澳元（约合3.82亿美元）的贷款。此举再次印证了私募信贷被用于资助利益相关者回报的趋势。【原文：Bain Capital Credit LP and UBS Group AG are lending a combined A$540 million ($382 million) to an Australian health-equipment manufacturer Aidacare Pty., according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest example of private credit being used to help finance stakeholder returns.】

item.title: 软银、东芝等企业对美日天然气项目感兴趣
item.description: 日本经济产业大臣赤泽凉生周三向记者表示，包括软银集团、东芝公司和日立公司在内的日本企业已表示有意参与美国总统特朗普宣布的天然气项目。【原文：Japanese companies including SoftBank Group, Toshiba Corp. and Hitachi Ltd. have expressed interest in participating in a US gas project announced by President Donald Trump, trade minister Ryosei Akazawa told reporters on Wednesday.】

item.title: YouTube故障影响34万用户，其他网站也出现中断
item.description: 据网络监测平台Downdetector称，YouTube近34万用户遭遇服务中断，该流媒体网站同时报告其推荐系统出现故障。【原文：YouTube was down for nearly 340,000 users, internet monitor Downdetector said, while the streaming site reported an issue with its recommendations system.】
